post.body: sorry whats your number again Gav? :P
ok, more studying time for me so!
elements?
interested in getting lunch at all?
probably will, can get the netbook if a certain hockey club gives me my money!
all of them really, leaning camera today cause I have a laptop + an mp3 player, but I just don't know...
no way :O
but you're in town!
Hugh Laurie hosting SNL http://www.nbc.com/Saturday_Night_Live/
burst appendixs are v. painful, you'd already have complained to me about it if you were worried....
well then you definitely haven't burst your appendix anyway!
sore when you lift your hand off on ur left 2/3 between ur pelvis and hip?
*e-hug* Am available for physio-advice 2moro eve if you want.
at least there were cool people sitting near you, sorry if we were a disturbance after the first hour...
Well I'd get jeans, but if they're the ae ones you have loads of then mix it up
@stepherunie Drunken pullung chair out from under someone, wasn't too bad I think but hair was obscuring my view...
It really pays to be up at an early hour, I had a 2am trip to AnE with a fresher who smashed their head...
yeah in 2016 it may but not now... also dinner went well, I'll do something similar when you're home!
The Bakery in town by the City Council are amazing, sometimes not too dear for bigger cakes
same people who thought Girls Aloud were a compatible support act, much as I love them
nearly bought the 1000d with 2 lenses last night but evil site wouldn't work, maybe it was a sign...
and they have Wall-E!
oh dear, *hugs* to all
Nothing, was the recording from the day in the Ar√°s
thanks for the lunch!
For you I nearly would
Let me know when, I'm so alone!
Aww wait til you hit season 2 + 3. I have all of them and am in close proximity to UCD if you're interested
27 Dresses, Superman Returns, Enchanted, X-men... you prob recognise him from The Notebook or Ally Mc Beal
LOVE a good plot. I even got a whiteboard for it
Wait till you see the cute photos of my puppy with my new camera. He's so Christmassy! There is a Santa hat...
Times are bad, was reading through UCCSU's constitution and standing orders... Btw ours are better!
And Brendan + Colin both nominated for best actor!
In Bruges up for a best picture award in the Golden Globes. Win!
Christmas lunch penciled in for next Thursday, keep it free if you don't like have an exam/full-time job.
<3 Dan for getting me a yard of jaffa!
Do I want a netbook, a proper camera or a touchscreen mp3 player for Christmas?
Wireless = win!
Anyone up for a mini roadtrip somewhere? In need of distraction....
FYI new Dominos in the shops behind the Montrose.
Have internet again with speedy new Eircom service and dodgy old O2 modem :)
RIP grandad, you had a good run.
Have decided to get a camera, now what one to get? Canon 1000d, 450d or sony a200? I can get an extra lenses with the 1000d or a200...
Alexandra IS performing with Beyonce 2moro :)
Back from Newry. Got canon 450d and dad got a netbook, happy out!
When I said dinner was ready at half 2 I meant it, anyone around UCD feel free to come over + eat!
If Caroline Kennedy had a scrotum they'd be printing off the posters for her presidential bid in 2016
Was annoyed at difficulties getting camera til the sterling plummeted some more today, money saving win!
Ordered Canon 450d and the bits + pieces to go with it. Can't wait for Christmas morning!
About to go hockeying for the first time in ages, have discovered my nail is dead as a result of the last hockey injury. No more please!
Just did an amazing taping job on my thumb post removing all the dead nail (the lower half if ur asking). Nail growth win!
LiLo/Ro fought in an airport (yawn), but I've been in it! http://tinyurl.com/99jjae
Nail can separate clearly from bottom end but top end is hanging on. Quite disgusting really.
Going to a Che Part 1 and 2 marathon soon, it better be good!
Was just on Radio One, didn't sound like myself at all!
Anyone free for road-triping 2moro from UCD around 3pm let me know!
Just solved a Rubik's Cube fully for the first time :)
New Countdown girl in being shit shocker http://tinyurl.com/8psnrh
Watching "The Express", am American Football movie with racial overtones. Typical but good :)
Merry Christmas, hope Santa was good to you all!
Just after washing the dog. Am wet...
